meanings.definition: A person who engages in logrolling.
meanings.sent1: The logroller helped his friend move the heavy log.
meanings.sent2: The logroller and his buddies worked together to move the logs down the river.
meanings.sent3: The logroller joked that he was the best at rolling logs in the whole town.
meanings.sent4: She was a true logroller, effortlessly navigating through the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The logroller's skill in moving logs was unmatched by anyone else.

meanings.sent1: He decided to logroll the timber to the other side of the field.
meanings.sent2: The workers logrolled the heavy logs to transport them to the sawmill.
meanings.sent3: She logrolled her way through the task with ease and efficiency.
meanings.sent4: The team logrolled their way to victory in the log-moving competition.
meanings.sent5: Logrolling requires strength and coordination to move the logs effectively.
